## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                          | Type                | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `option` | `option`  | When set to `basic`, content will fill the whole space of the block. | `"basic" \| "card"` | `undefined` |
